tool_description: Ranks and scores multiple candidates based on various criteria weights, providing comprehensive candidate comparison and selection recommendations.

candidate_ids.description: List of candidate identifiers to rank

skills_scores.description: Skills match scores for each candidate (0.0-1.0)

experience_scores.description: Experience relevance scores for each candidate (0.0-1.0)

education_scores.description: Education qualification scores for each candidate (0.0-1.0)

location_scores.description: Location compatibility scores for each candidate (0.0-1.0)

salary_scores.description: Salary compatibility scores for each candidate (0.0-1.0)

skills_weight.description: Weight for skills in overall scoring (0.0-1.0)

experience_weight.description: Weight for experience in overall scoring (0.0-1.0)

education_weight.description: Weight for education in overall scoring (0.0-1.0)

location_weight.description: Weight for location in overall scoring (0.0-1.0)

salary_weight.description: Weight for salary in overall scoring (0.0-1.0)

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: All score arrays must have same length as candidate_ids
Invalid score values: All scores must be between 0.0 and 1.0
Invalid weights: All weight values must be between 0.0 and 1.0
Weight sum error: All weights should sum to approximately 1.0 for meaningful ranking
Invalid ranking method: Use either 'weighted_average' or 'multiplicative'
Insufficient candidates: At least 2 candidates required for ranking
usage: Provide candidate IDs and their corresponding scores across different criteria. Adjust weights to reflect hiring priorities. The tool returns ranked candidate list with detailed scoring.

ranked_candidate_ids.description: Candidate IDs ordered by overall score (best to worst)

overall_scores.description: Overall scores corresponding to ranked candidates

ranking_summary.description: Summary of ranking methodology and key insights

score_breakdown.description: Detailed score breakdown for top candidates
